member.name: T:nexus.common.helper.IValueRows
member.summary: Represents a nongeneric collection of IValueCol collections of key/value pairs

member.name: M:nexus.common.helper.IValueRows.Reset
member.summary: Removes all elements from the IValueRows object
member.exception: Whenever encountering any IValueCols object having a other than ReadWriteDelete

member.name: T:nexus.common.helper.IValueCols
member.summary: Represents a nongeneric collection of key/value pairs

member.name: P:nexus.common.helper.IValueCols.IsFixedSize
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the IValueCols object has a fixed size (unalterable number of columns)

member.name: P:nexus.common.helper.IValueCols.IsReadOnly
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the IValueCols object is read-only

member.name: P:nexus.common.helper.IValueCols.Keys
member.summary: Gets an System.Collections.ICollection object containing the keys of the IValueCols object

member.name: P:nexus.common.helper.IValueCols.Values
member.summary: Gets an System.Collections.ICollection object containing the values in the IValueCols object

member.name: P:nexus.common.helper.IValueCols.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Gets or sets the element associated with the specified key
member.param: The key of the element to get or set
member.returns: The value object associated with the specified key
member.exception: The property is set and the IValueCols object is read-only
The property is set and the key does not exist in the collection and the IValueCols object has a fixed size.

member.name: M:nexus.common.helper.IValueCols.Add(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds an element with the provided key and value to the IValueCols object
member.param: The String to use as the key of the element to add
The Object to use as the key of the element to add
member.exception: An element with the same key already exists in the IValueCols object
The IValueCols object has a fixed size or the ?NameValueItem element is read-only?

member.name: M:nexus.common.helper.IValueCols.Add(System.String,System.Object,nexus.common.helper.ValueItemStatus)
member.summary: Adds an element with the provided key and value to the IValueCols object
member.param: The String to use as the key of the element to add
The Object to use as the value of the element to add
The ValueItemStatus to use as the status of the element to add
member.exception: An element with the same key already exists in the IValueCols object
The IValueCols object has a fixed size or the ?NameValueItem element is read-only?

member.name: M:nexus.common.helper.IValueCols.Clear
member.summary: Removes all elements from the IValueCols object
member.exception: Whenever encountering any IValueCols object having a other than ReadWriteDelete

member.name: M:nexus.common.helper.IValueCols.Contains(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether the IValueCols object contains an element with the specified key
member.param: The key to locate in the IValueSet object
member.returns: true if the IValueCols object contains an element with the key otherwise false

member.name: M:nexus.common.helper.IValueCols.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an IValueColsEnumerator object for the IValueCols object
member.returns: An IValueColsEnumerator object for the IValueCols object

member.name: M:nexus.common.helper.IValueCols.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the element with the specified key from the IValueCols object
member.param: The key of the element to remove
member.exception: The IValueCols object has a fixed size or the ?NameValueItem element is read-only?

member.name: M:nexus.common.helper.Currency.Words(System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts currency value into a word string
member.returns: The string detailing the value in words

member.name: M:nexus.common.helper.Currency.WordBlocks(System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts currency value into a word blocks for hundthou, thou, hund, dolars and cents
member.returns: The string[] listing the block word values

member.name: M:nexus.common.helper.Currency.WordDigits(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts currency into digit words for the dollars and a word block for cents
member.param: The number of digits (plus cents) to convert
member.returns: The string[] listing the digit words

member.summary: Controls all logging activity

member.summary: Indicates if a logging error has occurred

member.summary: Controls whether a timestamp is prefixed to all messages
